DOC.brief_summary: This study assess mass balance recovery , pharmacokinetics , metabolite profile metabolite identification defactinib .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I , Open-label Study Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion Defactinib ( VS-6063 ) Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 35.0 kg/m2 History ( Hx ) regular bowel movement Creatinine clearance > 80 mL/min Hx alcohol abuse past 2 yr Current smoker Systolic blood pressure ( S ) diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) upper limit reference range ( age 4044 > 90/140 ; age 4565 > 90/150 )
